thread.title: VIDEO: Colin Kaepernick hits guy in face with wild throw
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Colin Kaepernick hits guy in face with wild throw - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: VIDEO: Colin Kaepernick hits guy in face with wild throw
text:
Remember when Colin Kaepernick was supposed to be the next big thing in the NFL?
We’re pretty sure at least one member of the 49ers staff doesn’t, although he may not remember anything at this point after getting nailed in the face by an errant Kaepernick pass during Thursday night’s game against the Seattle Seahawks.
The unidentified Niners employee was minding his own business on the sidelines when Kaepernick’s wild throw sailed way out of bounds and landed right upside his unsuspecting victim’s head.
It was Kaepernick’s second straight out-of-bounds pass.
Ben Margot/AP Colin Kaepernick's awful aim claims an unfortunate victim on the 49ers sidelines. MOBILE USERS: WATCH THE VIDEO HERE
The 49ers medical personnel spoke to the staff member, and by all accounts he suffered no significant damage.
The same can’t be said of Kaepernick’s already hurting reputation.
